entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chesterfield
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:15 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chesterfield Inlet Airport 03:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -39.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -43.8°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 39.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 39. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blowing snow. High minus 34.
